[docs]class StdRegions(object):

    soma = 'soma'
    axon = 'axon'
    dendrite = 'dendrite'
    apicaldendrite = 'apicaldendrite'




[docs]class SWCRegionCodes(object):

    name2number = {
        StdRegions.soma: 1,
        StdRegions.axon: 2,
        StdRegions.dendrite: 3,
        StdRegions.apicaldendrite: 4,
        }

    # Create the inverse
    @classmethod

[docs]    def number2name(cls):
        return dict([(value, key) for (key, value) in
                    SWCRegionCodes.name2number.iteritems()])
